entry.title: Carborundum 62264 - Type 01 Straight Wheels Gold 32Ar Aluminum Oxide 32Ar60-Jv40 8X1/4X1-1/4 05539562264
entry.summary:
Vendor: Carborundum
Type: Type 01 Straight Wheels
Price: 39.95

[shortdesc]
  • Used on surface, cylindrical, and tool and cutter grinders, Carborundum vitrified toolroom wheels maximize your productivity
  • Our broad product offering provides superior solutions for every ferrous and nonferrous MRO, small job shop, and production operation.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Carborundum
    Arbor 1-1/4 Inch
    Diameter 8 Inch
    Grit 60
    Width 1/4 Inch
    Product Type Type 01 Straight Wheels

    Product Information

  • Gray/purple-colored, high-performance aluminum oxide is exceptionally cool, fast cutting on medium-to-heavy stock removal operations
  • Strong, sharp monocrystalline grain blend provides excellent resistance to point wear with good penetration on tough alloy steels
  • Tough, yet friable, grain holds form well and requires less dressing
  • Ideal for moderate-to-heavy infeed rates, rapid stock removal, and precision contouring on all types of tool steels
    		•
